skills.label: cpp
skills.title: C++: Programming Language
skills.subtitle: High Performance and Interoperability
skills.description: I use C++ to develop high-performance libraries and APIs, focusing on projects where efficiency and low-level control are essential, such as high-volume data processing and system optimization.

skills.label: python
skills.title: Python: Programming Language
skills.subtitle: Data Science and Machine Learning
skills.description: I use Python to build data pipelines, perform data analysis, develop machine learning models, and automate workflows in data-driven environments.

skills.label: tensorflow
skills.title: TensorFlow: Deep Learning Framework
skills.subtitle: Neural Network Modeling
skills.description: I use TensorFlow to design and train deep learning models in Python, applied to tasks such as time series forecasting, synthetic data generation, and AI experimentation with sequential and generative architectures.

skills.label: nodejs
skills.title: NodeJS: Backend Runtime Environment
skills.subtitle: Server-Side Development
skills.description: I use NodeJS to build fast and scalable backend services, enabling the development of RESTful APIs, real-time applications with WebSockets, and efficient database integrations.

skills.label: javascript
skills.title: Javascript: Programming Language
skills.subtitle: Dynamic Behavior and Frontend Logic
skills.description: I use JavaScript to add interactivity and dynamic behavior to web applications through event handling and data rendering. It complements HTML and CSS in building responsive, data-driven user interfaces.

skills.label: typescript
skills.title: TypeScript: Typed JavaScript Superset
skills.subtitle: Strong Typing and Code Reliability
skills.description: I use TypeScript to enhance JavaScript with static typing and advanced tooling. It improves reliability, maintainability, and scalability by reducing runtime errors and supporting large-scale projects.

skills.label: react
skills.title: React: UI 'Framework'
skills.subtitle: Web user interface
skills.description: I use React to build dynamic and reusable user interfaces through component-based architecture. It simplifies state management, optimizes rendering performance, and enables the development of scalable single-page applications (SPA).

skills.label: tailwind
skills.title: Tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework
skills.subtitle: Fast development of modern websites
skills.description: I use Tailwind to style web applications with utility-first classes, accelerating development while ensuring responsive and modern design. It allows building consistent layouts directly within the HTML structure.

skills.label: bash
skills.title: Bash: Build Automation Tool
skills.subtitle: Automates Compilation and Workflow Tasks
skills.description: I use Bash in the Linux terminal to automate tasks, manage workflows, and write scripts for compilation, testing, and system administration. It is an essential tool for efficient development and daily operations in Linux environments.

skills.label: git
skills.title: Git: Version Control System
skills.subtitle: Code Management and Collaboration
skills.description: I use Git to track changes, manage branches, and collaborate on code efficiently. Most of my projects are versioned and maintained with Git, often integrated with GitHub for remote hosting and CI/CD pipelines.

skills.label: docker
skills.title: Docker: Containerization Platform
skills.subtitle: Environment Automation and Portability
skills.description: I use Docker to containerize applications and ensure consistent environments across development and production. With Docker Compose, I orchestrate multi-container setups for projects involving databases, APIs, and data processing pipelines.

skills.label: mysql
skills.title: MySQL: Relational Database
skills.subtitle: Ideal for Web and Lightweight Applications
skills.description: I use MySQL to design and manage relational data models, especially in projects with frontend integration. It’s effective for creating normalized schemas with tools like MySQL Workbench and is well-suited for small to medium-scale applications.

skills.label: postgres
skills.title: PostgreSQL: Relational Database
skills.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Data Management
skills.description: PostgreSQL is my preferred choice for scalable and robust data management solutions. I use it in production environments, often with Docker-based setups, due to its reliability, advanced features, and strong SQL compliance.

skills.label: influxdb
skills.title: InfluxDB: Time Series Database
skills.subtitle: Real-Time Data Monitoring
skills.description: I use InfluxDB to store and query time series data efficiently, especially for system and application monitoring. It’s a NoSQL engine optimized for time-stamped data and integrates seamlessly with tools like Grafana.

skills.label: grafana
skills.title: Grafana: Data Visualization Platform
skills.subtitle: Observability and AI Monitoring
skills.description: I use Grafana to build interactive dashboards that visualize time series data, system metrics, and AI results. It plays a key role in MLOps pipelines by tracking model performance and monitoring infrastructure in real time.
